arm_group.description: 600 mcg oral misoprostol administered during the third stage of labor
10 IU oxytocin delivered IM with UnijectTM during he third stage of labor

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a large, community-based, cluster-randomized trial to compare routine prophylactic
      use of 600 mcg oral misoprostol and 10 IU oxytocin delivered by UnijectTM intramuscularly
      during the third stage of labor

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparing Misoprostol and Oxytocin in Uniject for Postpartum Hemorrhage (PPH) Prevention in Senegal

detailed_description.textblock:
This study will assess the programmatic implications (including feasibility, acceptability,
      risks and benefits) at the community level of the introduction of misoprostol and/or
      oxytocin in UnijectTM for the prevention of PPH and will help to identify the appropriate
      niche for both drugs.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  women delivering in community health centers (case de sante) with a trained study
             provider (matrone) who are able to provide informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  women with known contraindications to prostaglandins

intervention.description: 10 IU oxytocin delivered intramuscularly with UnijectTM

facility.name: Health huts in the district of Thiadiaye and Kolda

clinical_study.official_title: Preventing Postpartum Hemorrhage: Examining Two Strategies for PPH Prevention in Communities: Misoprostol and Oxytocin Uniject in Senegal

oversight_info.authority: Senegal: Ministry of Health and Prevention

primary_outcome.description: To establish the comparable effectiveness of two technologies, individual pre- and post-delivery Hb measures will be taken to calculate change in Hb. This will be done using a Hemocue Hemoglobin machine + cuvette (HemoCue, Angelholm, Sweden). The Hemocue is a simple means of collecting Hb measures at the community-level where traditional laboratory techniques are not feasible

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence and management of side effects

secondary_outcome.description: administration of the drug after the birth of the baby and verifying no twin, before the expulsion of the placenta
secondary_outcome.time_frame: collected immediately following birth, verified 1-3 days postpartum
during third trimester and 1-3 days postpartum

secondary_outcome.description: use of additional uterotonics, manual removal of placental fragments, etc
referral requested, transfers carried out, reasons for incomplete referrals/transfers
acceptability according to woman of study medication, care received, side effects experienced

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
